amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for the Cooperative Threat Reduction program for activities with Russia until the President certifies to Congress that Russia has terminated its offensive biological weapons program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds authorized in the bill for the Cooperative Threat Reduction program, until the President certifies that the Russian government has terminated its biological weapons program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dornan amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 244 - 180 (Roll no. 369).
